customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Channel name already taken for public channel
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Create a channel or note the name of an existing channel
  2. Create a new public channel on the same team and give it the same name
  3. Save
inline.expectedResult:
• User gets a message saying:
    • Webapp:
      • "A channel with that name already exists on the same team"
    • Mobile apps:
      • "A channel with that URL was previously created"

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) UI Automation: Write an automated test using `cypress` for "Channel name already exists" — MM-14635
customFields.Important notes about this step: Se and Cy tests cover browser

inline.description:
Channel name already taken for private channel
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Create a channel or note the name of an existing channel
  2. Create a new private channel on the same team and give it the same name
  3. Save
inline.expectedResult:
• User gets a message saying:
    • Webapp:
      • "A channel with that name already exists on the same team"
    • Mobile apps:
      • "A channel with that URL was previously created"
